text: A Bacillus phage is a member of a group of bacteriophages known to have bacteria in the genus Bacillus as host species. These bacteriophages have been found to belong to the families Myoviridae, Siphoviridae, Podoviridae or Tectiviridae. ==Applications== The DNA polymerase of Bacillus phage phi29 is a unique and efficient polymerase with proofreading activity. ==References== ==External links== * The Bacillus Phage Database Category:Bacillus phages
title: Bacillus phage
